original_title: Two Chicks at the Same Time, Man!
overview: What would you do if you had a million dollars? I'll tell you what I'd do, man. . . Two Chicks At The Same Time, Man! That's it? If you had a million dollars, you'd do two chicks at the same time? Damn straight! I always wanted to do that, man. And I think if I were a millionaire I could hook that up, too. . .
title: Two Chicks at the Same Time, Man!
